pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.authentication

Class LogoutInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.authentication.LogoutInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionInterceptor<AuthenticationOperationContext>

    public class LogoutInterceptor
extends Object
implements ActionInterceptor<AuthenticationOperationContext>
    Logout interceptor handles logout process, invalidates current authentication and removes it from concurrent authentications for this username.

    Created on: 18.02.13 20:57

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Method Detail

      • intercept

        public void intercept(ActionExecutionContext context,
             AuthenticationOperationContext interceptorContext)
        Description copied from interface: ActionInterceptor
        Intercepts action execution. The latter execution stage is, the more information is available in ActionExecutionContext object. Interceptor may modify or change various action execution information, as well as cancel response sending by calling ActionExecutionContext.cancelResponseSending() method.
        Specified by:
        intercept in interface ActionInterceptor<AuthenticationOperationContext>
        Parameters:
        context - action execution context object, created for each action execution.
        interceptorContext - interception execution context, created for each interception operation.
